about_the_game:
When her evil brother takes over her temples in a ploy to rise to greater power, the Moon Goddess-- Vie-- enlists the help of a lowly town guardsman named Cut in order to take back her territory, stop her brother, and save the world.

Join Cut As He:

- Dies repeatedly to monsters twice (or even half) his size.

- Builds a unique book of spells with the Goddess's divine power.

- Deals with narcissistic, condescending deities guarding the stolen temples.

- Upgrades his stats and spells while fighting towards the next boss!

- Gets tired of dying repeatedly.

- Tries again.

Features Include:

- Deck-building your personal spell book.

- Randomly generated maps and routes on each run, and the push to do it all over again when you fail.

- Breathtaking pixel art.

- An original, adaptive soundtrack consisting of tracks that change to fit the gameplay

- A story about saving the world, and yourself.

NOW WITH 50% FEWER SELF-INSERT CHARACTERS!!

name: Vie: Try Again
short_description: When her evil brother takes over her temples in a ploy to rise to greater power, the Moon Goddess-- Vie-- enlists the help of a lowly town guardsman named Cut in order to take back her territory, stop her brother, try again, and save the world.
